Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes services provided, requested , promised etc to the patient

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Services Care Professionals and Carers subset with subset original id 1071000000135.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
